title: SC to hear Faizabad sit-in review petitions on Nov 1
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 25 (APP): A three-member bench of the Supreme Court would take up Faizabad sit-in review petitions for hearing on November 1.
The bench would be presided by Chief Justice of Pakistan Justice Qazi Faez Isa. The Registrar office of the top court had issued notices to respondents including the Attorney General of Pakistan.
It may be mentioned here that Pakistan Tehreek e Insaf (PTI), Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP), Muttahida Qaumi Movement (MQM) and others had already filed applications to withdraw the review petitions.
